name: Facts about WordPress
author: Anirudh S

sections.description:
I would like to mention that this being my first plugin, it is heavily based on Matt Mullenweg’s Hello Dolly plugin. The facts are taken from Wikipedia and I’m planning to add more to the list soon.

This plugin ensures that all users who utilize this plugin can be updated with facts about WordPress.
sections.installation: Upload and activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Why are there only limited number of facts in this plugin ?

The content of these facts are taken from Wikipedia, where the information is available for reuse. The author of this plugin has not found other such sources yet.

short_description: Here is a short description of the plugin.
